divs: Sighting DetailsLooked out window and noticed an object displaying unusual light patterns watched for several seconds, did not believe to be aircraft, grabbed two different cameras tried to photo,it was being circled by other aircraft which displayed the usual aircraft flashes and strobes, it changed from different colored lights in a horizontal row to a large glowing white light filmed for several minutes until it dissapeared behind the mountain.
Summary: first rotating light then bright white light
trends: There have been 13 other sightings in Cottonwood
There were no other sightings in Cottonwood on or around December 3rd 2009
This sighting has never been favorited.
